## Examples

```jslive
initialState = { value: null };
<RemoteChoicesWidget
    endpoint="https://api.github.com/users/alliancesoftware/repos"
    labelFieldName="full_name"
    placeholder="Search for repos for Alliance Software in github"
    value={state.value}
    style={{ width: 500 }}
    onChange={(value) => setState({ value })}
/>
```
